==Useful Info==
'''Maggie the Vainglorious''' is a [[unique]] [[fire elementalist]] apprentice. She wears [[steam dragon scales|steam]], [[acid dragon scales|acid]], or [[swamp dragon scales]]. 

She is a younger, weaker version of [[Margery]]. Maggie and Margery are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:6-10
*[[The Lair]]:1-2

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Her [[Bolt of Fire]] seriously hurts, but Maggie herself is reasonably squishy. Try to disable her with [[Hexes]] or a [[wand]] if possible -- her [[willpower]] and [[hit dice]] are both mediocre. [[Mephitic Cloud]] or [[dart]]s are also effective as long as she isn't wearing swamp dragon scales, though darts will require some skill in using them to be reliable.
*If you get [[mesmerised]] and need to retreat, you'll need to either disable Maggie using one of the aforementioned methods or break [[LOS|line-of-sight]]. Reading a [[scroll of teleportation]] or [[scroll of fog]] will work adequately.
*Maggie has a small chance of spawning with a slightly pre-enchanted [[Wyrmbane]]. This artefact is an excellent weapon, if you can manage to take it from her.

==History==
*Maggie was added in version [[0.25]].
